GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v4.14.296
GSD.description:
vhost/vsock: Use kvmalloc/kvfree for larger packets.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.296 by commit 0d720c3f0a03e97867deab7e480ba3d3e19837ba, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 433fc58e6bf2c8bd97e57153ed28e64fd78207b8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: vhost/vsock: Use kvmalloc/kvfree for larger packets.
